Gravity Compensation Controller Tutorial

This package shows the capabilities of the robot approaching to the table, grasping and placing an object by using WBC. Moreover is also a tutorial on how to use smach_c, whole body control and how to generate steps to move the robot.

In this package the user could learn how to:

  • Create a single smach_c state.
  • Create an action smach_c state.
  • Generate a smach_c state machine by concatenating several smach_c states.
  • Generate an action server state machine.
  • Create a smach_c concurrence for parallel states/state_machines
  • Use boost optional to pass parameters by constructor or by user_data (during exeution time).
  • Change controller actions walking <-> WBC.
  • Generate and execute a set of steps for the robot.
  • Learn the usage of the basic smach_c states (move_tip, aruco_detection, gaze_task, get_outcomes, wait_for_aruco_detection, play_motion).
